content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in harju county court the case involved two parties referred to as sl and tl who were previously married sl is seeking the division of joint property and financial compensation from tl sl contributed money towards the construction of a house on tls property during their marriage after their divorce tl asked sl to leave the shared residence and sl is now seeking the division of the joint property and compensation for their financial contributions tl argues that the property should be considered separate property the court will need to determine the division of the joint property and the amount of compensation taking into account the contributions made by both parties in the case party b transferred money to the defendants account as part of a compensation proceeding for joint property the defendant also owed alimony to party vb the defendant argues that they had enough money to divide a building specifically the first floor based on their personal financial resources the defendant believes their share of the buildings value should be considered the parties also took a loan from a bank for the construction of the second floor the court determined the defendants share to be 31 the defendant objects to the plaintiffs claim of the right to use the property and demands compensation for the benefits of usufruct the plaintiff and defendant are involved in a case regarding the termination of joint ownership the plaintiff claims that the defendant should compensate them for their contribution to the construction of a building the court concluded that the plaintiffs claim is partially justified the parties were previously married and divorced and the defendant became the owner of the property through the real estate register the courts decision is based on the civil code and the family act the parties are disputing the value of the property the court determined the average value of the property to be 231500 euros the court also determined the average value of the undeveloped property to be 35333 euros the total value of the common property to be divided is 196167 euros the court determined that the parties built the house together and that the property should remain the sole ownership of the defendant however the plaintiff should be compensated for their loss the defendant was ordered to pay compensation to the plaintiff the plaintiff also demanded compensation for the defendants use of the property which was calculated based on the rental value the court determined the amount of compensation and ordered the defendant to pay it to the plaintiff in another case involving joint ownership of a car the plaintiff was awarded a total of 2714 euros the plaintiff initially wanted to terminate the joint ownership and receive compensation from the defendant but later withdrew this claim the court order and judgment were issued by the tallinn district court and harju county court respectively in 2021 a legal decision was partially annulled the specific parties involved are not mentioned

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
